alert.note: Alert for Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 11:10AM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Harney and northwestern Malheur Counties through NOON PDT... At 1110 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Beulah, or 48 miles northeast of Burns, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Drinkwater Pass around 1140 AM PDT. Juntura around 1250 PM MDT. Warm Springs Reservoir around 1200 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
